contentrichtext.text: {{main|ISO 3166-2}} '''ISO 3166-2:AO''' is the entry for [[Angola]] in [[ISO 3166-2]], part of the [[ISO 3166]] [[standardization|standard]] published by the [[International Organization for Standardization]] (ISO), which defines [[code]]s for the names of the principal [[country subdivision|subdivision]]s (e.g., [[province]]s or [[state (administrative division)|state]]s) of all [[country|countries]] coded in [[ISO 3166-1]]. Currently for Angola, ISO 3166-2 codes are defined for [[provinces of Angola|18 provinces]]. Each code consists of two parts, separated by a hyphen. The first part is <tt>AO</tt>, the [[ISO 3166-1 alpha-2]] code of Angola. The second part is three letters. ==Current codes== Subdivision names are listed as in the ISO 3166-2 standard published by the ISO 3166 Maintenance Agency (ISO 3166/MA). ''Click on the button in the header to sort each column.'' {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Code ! Subdivision name |- | <tt>AO-BGO</tt> | [[Bengo Province|Bengo]] |- | <tt>AO-BGU</tt> | [[Benguela Province|Benguela]] |- | <tt>AO-BIE</tt> | [[Bié Province|Bié]] |- | <tt>AO-CAB</tt> | [[Cabinda Province|Cabinda]] |- | <tt>AO-CCU</tt> | [[Cuando-Cubango Province|Cuando-Cubango]] |- | <tt>AO-CNO</tt> | [[Cuanza Norte Province|Cuanza Norte]] |- | <tt>AO-CUS</tt> | [[Cuanza Sul Province|Cuanza Sul]] |- | <tt>AO-CNN</tt> | [[Cunene Province|Cunene]] |- | <tt>AO-HUA</tt> | [[Huambo Province|Huambo]] |- | <tt>AO-HUI</tt> | [[Huíla Province|Huíla]] |- | <tt>AO-LUA</tt> | [[Luanda Province|Luanda]] |- | <tt>AO-LNO</tt> | [[Lunda Norte Province|Lunda Norte]] |- | <tt>AO-LSU</tt> | [[Lunda Sul Province|Lunda Sul]] |- | <tt>AO-MAL</tt> | [[Malange Province|Malange]] |- | <tt>AO-MOX</tt> | [[Moxico Province|Moxico]] |- | <tt>AO-NAM</tt> | [[Namibe Province|Namibe]] |- | <tt>AO-UIG</tt> | [[Uíge Province|Uíge]] |- | <tt>AO-ZAI</tt> | [[Zaire Province|Zaire]] |} ==Changes== The following changes to the entry have been announced in newsletters by the ISO 3166/MA since the first publication of ISO 3166-2 in 1998: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Newsletter ! Date issued ! Description of change in newsletter |- | id="I-2" | [http://www.iso.org/iso/iso_3166-2_newsletter_i-2_en.pdf {{nowrap|Newsletter I-2}}] | {{nowrap|2002-05-21}} | Spelling correction in AO-ZAI |} ==See also== * [[Subdivisions of Angola]] * [[List of FIPS region codes (A-C)#AO: Angola|FIPS region codes of Angola]] ==External links== * [http://www.statoids.com/uao.html Provinces of Angola], Statoids.com {{ISO 3166}} [[Category:ISO 3166|2:AO]] [[Category:Provinces of Angola|*ISO 3166-2]] [[Category:Angola-related lists]]
